articles.title: South Africa to get a new space-junk tracking facility – part-owned by Russia - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The South African National Space Agency (Sansa) and Russian space agency Roscosmos announced a new space-debris tracking antenna to be based at Sansa's Hartebeeshoek facility in the North West province.

articles.title: A Chinese man made bank staff count R12 million by hand because guards were rude to him - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The man said he had received the "worst customer service." The bank said the man got angry after a guard asked him to wear a face mask.
articles.content:

articles.title: The creator of the term 'metaverse' wants people to know he has 'nothing to do' with Facebook's Meta plans - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Author Neal Stephenson coined the term "metaverse" in his book "Snow Crash," but said he isn't advising Facebook on its plans for a virtual world.
articles.content:
Facebook changed its name to Meta this week amid a wave of scandals, hoping to distract people with its massive investment in a virtual world that CEO Mark Zuckerberg called a "metaverse."
